alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 1:22PM MST until July 25 at 2:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 122 PM MST, The National Park Service reported that washes were flowing east of Temple Bar, but Temple Bar Road and the facilities around Temple Bar were not impacted by flooding. Heavy rain has dissipated in the area but washes will be flowing into Lake Mead east of Temple Bar. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Washes east and southeast of Temple Bar. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
